title: Works great
text: Airbnb makes it easy for whenever I travel. I have been scammed once in London and customer service was happy to refund me my money.

title: Their automatic system will not allow you to book
text:
We were looking for an air Bnb to have dinner during Xmas time. However, air bnb denied us. Because we are a thread to having a party at the air bnb. 

Horrible app!!! Will try other apps to rent homes.

title: Great experience
text: I stayed two nights in this beautiful jewel, great host, very respectful, responsive, and willing to go above and beyond. Highly recommend it?

title: Fix your app
text: worst booking app.

title: Not worth it anymore
text: More expensive than a hotel room and with everything considered it really not worth it.

title: absolutely ridiculous
text: My 88 year old grandmother, 60 year old mother, and I stayed in an absolute nightmare of a room and already left a review for that but i just want to warn anyone wanting to use this app for their next vacation. this was supposed to be a birthday trip for my mother but ended up being a robbery of our money. we asked for a refund and got about 5% of everything we spent back. first they claimed to be unable to help me because too much time had passed but that was only because they failed to provide me with a proper process to provide the documents i had for proof. then since i was back home i had surgery scheduled and was unable to deal with the whole process because i was preoccupied. they were just absolutely unhelpful and horrible. never using this app again. iâ€™m so angry i donâ€™t even feel like typing anymore . just know that the support team seems to be completely mindless and unhelpful.

title: Pics/vid to validate: Worst Customer Service Ever
text: If I could rate a 0 star I would. I had an UNPLEASANT experience with the host who made multiple false claims on the place we paid to stay in. It was dirty, had lack of privacy in the rooms in which the neighbors could see you in (especially in the bathroom), and the host lied(grow up) about bringing maintenance by to fix the technical problems (which maintenance didnâ€™t come at all -valid in the messages), and unsafe area. We kindly discussed the issues and the host became highly disrespectful and unhinged where the host claimed we took a window covering and put in the garbage- we have video proof of it NOT being there at all before we even place our bags in the rooms.  Not to mention who would do that?!  ) it was at that point we had to leave and find another place to stay. We reported our concerns to Airbnb (their name Cristian :case manager)& denied us our refund. We provided pics and videos they wanted. Only for manager to say  they canâ€™t resolve the issues . SMH . But if they had our experience I bet they would think differently. Wouldnâ€™t recommend at all. I can see why thereâ€™s a 1.5 review on the consumer review. Would love to know that sooner

title: Price transparency is nonexistent
text: Really disappointing to see how far Airbnb has fallen. Most listings are loaded with junk fees that make hotel prices look reasonable. Itâ€™s often difficult to book places even if you are willing to offer up a limb as collateral. I guess weâ€™re heading back to a world where hotels are the place to stay when traveling

title: Scam
text: Deleting this app. Itâ€™s disgusting and a let down.

title: Fraudulent travel insurance.
text: AirBnBâ€™s travel insurance is fraudulent! Iâ€™ve been trying to cancel a policy for the past three days. Now, Iâ€™m unfortunately outside the â€œ10-dayâ€ trial period and unable to receive a refund. Iâ€™ve exchanged 15 emails with them and 6 phone calls consuming over 2 hours of my time. Sadly, they all lack sufficient details to cancel a policy. Iâ€™ve navigated every link on the trip reservation website but couldn't find anything allowing me to cancel. Their website functionality is very poor. I found an FAQ titled "How can I cancel my policy?" Although, sadly, it also fails to provide sufficient details to cancel. Iâ€™ve called their insurance underwriter, Generali, to cancel, but they also canâ€™t cancel it. They merely refer me back to the worthless website and AirBnBâ€™s customer service phone number. Then, after calling AirBnB, they merely refer me back to Generaliâ€™s phone number. AirBnBâ€™s insurance operation is fraudulent. Theyâ€™ve established this circular system to confuse and delay customers from canceling within the 10-day trial period. Plus, their phone reps are hard to understand, as they donâ€™t speak English well, which causes lengthy delays.

title: Deleting for so many reasons
text:
1) unreasonable fees added on
2) sketchy renters
3) support of a terrorist state

title: The app is not fully functioning.
text: I got so many error messages when using it. Freezing on loading the calendar from the bookmark list, etc. Unfortunately itâ€™s not a smooth user experience.

title: Worst
text: The worst company. They give so much power to host. Did you know host are allowed to hide your reviews? So if you have a bad experience or something negative the host has the option to hide it from the public. All these reviews and rating are biased in the host favor. I will never use AirBnB again. Ever.

title: You donâ€™t get help via the app during an emergencyâ€¦
text: Instead the help chat for renters seems to be a chatbot who does not understand your problem. When a real human finally jumps in they only copy paste standard answers. We just wanted to know how to react to multiple power outages during a stay and were finally locked out of the apartment at night just having a key card relying on power.

title: Terrible Support
text: I stopped renting through airbnb after they left me to stay In a room with dirty sheets, after complaining through support they offered me a 50% reimbursement

title: Not compatible!!
text: Unbelievable, among the hundreds of app updates, Airbnb is the only app that is not compatible with iOS 15.8.

title: Pamela Owens
text: My family had a wonderful stay at Whisper Chateau over the summer, We booked the entire weekend to host a large celebration for our daughters graduation. The owners have done a fantastic job with this property from the gated entrance to the gourmet kitchen and custom details throughout the entire property there was an abundance of entertainment space inside and outside.What makes it so special is I was Jackie and Johnâ€™s agent on this property and I got to watch the transformation of this property into such an amazing place to be. If you are looking for luxury and privacy just outside of the city Whisper Chateau Will not disappoint ğŸ‰

title: Mas decepciones que alegrÃ­as
text:
He tenido muy malas experiencias y para mi la app provoca muchos problemas.
Por ejemplo, si cancelas tu reserva un dÃ­a antes no te devuelven todo el dinero. Es entendible si hiciste la reserva semanas antes y le impediste al anfitrion tener la casa disponible para otros huespedes.
Pero a veces uno no tiene tiempo de andar planificando viajes con tanta anticipaciÃ³n, por ejemplo yo suelo buscar airbnb de un dÃ­a para otro. Hace poco reservÃ© un airbnb para el dia siguiente, instantaneamente me surgiÃ³ una urgencia que me obligÃ³ a cambiar mis planes y en menos de 15 minutos cancelÃ© la reserva. Como el sistema considera que estoy cancelando un dia antes del inicio de la estadia entonces elige no devolverme todo el dinero. Realmente tengo que perder 200usd por haber evitado que el anfitriÃ³n ofrezca esa vivienda durante 15 minutos?? A mi me parece injusto. Entiendo si me cobra una pequeÃ±a multa o un pequeÃ±o porcentaje. Pero bÃ¡sicamente le regalÃ© 200usd a un anfitrion en 15 minutos. Acto seguido me prometi nunca mas volver a usar esta app.

El otro problema es que no sirve para planificar tu viaje porque nunca te muestra el precio final. Al principio parece que rinde economicamente pero luego agrega su comision y el servicio de limpieza y termina siendo mas caro que un hotel 3 estrellas, por lo que el 95% de las veces no conviene.

Recuerdo hace muchos aÃ±os la app rendÃ­a porque era beneficiosa para anfitriones y huespedes. Mientras uno ganaba algo de dinero alquilando temporalmente su casa, el otro podia viajar un poco mas barato. Hoy los precios se han disparado a un nivel que ya no tiene sentido, afectando no solo al viajero sino tambien al vecino que vive en la ciudad y le aumenta constantemente el valor de alquileres de largo plazo al mismo tiempo que se reduce notablemente la oferta. Por este motivo encuentro totalmente lÃ³gico que las grandes ciudades estÃ©n comenzando a prohibirla.

title: Profits over people
text: Be advised of â€œstrictâ€ cancellation policies that robs you of your investment (what a joke). Airbnb as well as hosts on this service will do anything to rip you off and not refund you for any reason! Thereâ€™s a reason there are so many properties being listed as an Airbnb, itâ€™s a widespread scam. Shouts out to Greg and Kathy in Arizona ğŸ¤ğŸ½

title: Misleading stays
text: I think the no refund policy is barbaric. I am in a situation where I was grossly misguided by the photographs and rented a place that is in fowl condition. Iâ€™m stuck here. If this company is going to promote rentals there should be some layer of supervision over the spaces. This is criminal.

title: Abysmal customer support
text: Abysmal customer support

title: Listings on disputed territory
text: It is an absolute disgrace to allow listing in ILLEGALLY occupied West Bank.

title: Untrustworthy app and host
text: Had a terrible experience recently where the host compromised my safety and when I left and honest, but balanced review, Airbnb removed it. Even the superhost title means nothing.

title: Do not use Gift Cards
text: I recently tried booking a two week trip and I have contacted air bnb multiple times, they tell me they canâ€™t verify me( I have already verified my identity), also have tried to get me to pay out of pocket after I spent $1,500.00 in gift cards(bank account is linked to the account Iâ€™m trying to book with). So I try booking my stay 3 different times with no success . Then when I try to contact customer service I get redirected to people who canâ€™t help me solve the issue . I have grown sick of not getting this issue solved and at this point would rather use another service .

title: Discriminatory
text: Customer service was unhelpful. Only allowed me to request one room. Otherwise auto denied me.

title: FIX INTERFACE
text: Why is it so you make it so hard to find stuff. â€œManage listingsâ€ why isnâ€™t there a Home Screen and why isnâ€™t that phrase there so I can find it. Why isnâ€™t there a search tool function so I can manage my account. As a hostâ€™r this interface is horrible. Its not simple. There isnâ€™t an availability area to change your calendar. Like make multiple ways to get to the same section. Itâ€™s exhausting to have to open a YouTube video on how to find what Iâ€™m looking for on Airbnb like why isnâ€™t there a place to search for a manual on how to use the site directly on the site. Itâ€™s designed like a social media app - THIS IS NOT A SOCIAL MEDIA APP like simplify your design, and stop deleting buttons. One update and now i canâ€™t find what I need to do and I need to waste time researching it. Its ridiculous.

title: Great until thereâ€™s an issue
text: This app is great until something happens. They only care about the host. Definitely will only use vrbo from now on.

title: Not what it used to be
text: Used to love airbnb but itâ€™s overpriced now and has too many scammers making a killing off of hidden fees and charges. They will bill you after your stay for â€œunexpected cleaningâ€. Airbnb will fully support the hostâ€™s claim even if you left the place as requested in the listing. And the time they allow you to review a host isnâ€™t enough time to resolve a dispute, so donâ€™t let the good host reviews fool you. What a joke. Going back to hotels where they donâ€™t charge you extra cleaning fees after already charging $450 for cleaning plus more than the monthly rent just to stay a week.

title: Bed sort
text: Is there a way to search for a place with only 2 bedrooms?  Seems when I do a search like that, I get 2,3,4 + bedrooms.

title: The worst customer service
text: Have been a host with air B&B for over 10 years. Every every every time I have called for support. It has been incredibly frustrating. Then if you have to make a claim you have to jump through thousand hoops itâ€™s not even worth it. Host your rental somewhere else!

title: Trash customer support
text:
I canceled my reservation with ZERO refund. Their policies are very anti-user and regardless of how much of a heads up you give them or the hosts (probably from California) youâ€™ll get pretty much next to nothing back. 

Customer supported offered me less than a third back. I told them to stick it, Iâ€™ll take the loss and never recommend their services ever again.

title: Horrible customer service
text: I am appalled at the support I have received from this app! I got an Airbnb and unfortunately not a good one! I called for support and of course its some support in another country. You cant get an American customer support rep and they dont care about you having a serious concern. I have requested a supervisor and I have been told they cant transfer me to a supervisor or a manager. I will never understand why an American made service will alway outsource instead of giving ppl here in America opportunities to work. All for the sense of saving a dollar! At this point I rather pay extra at a hotel. At least if i have problem it gets fixed immediately!

title: Awful !
text: Awful customer service team

title: Customer service is clueless
text: I have asked for a simple thing from customer service support but no one can understand the request. I have to escalate the issue all the way up to executive management and it is more than a week and no updates yet. They do not care for customer at all

title: Taking down negative reviews - suppressing honesty
text: Airbnb informed me that they took down my review saying it violated their policy- which it did not. My review of the host was negative because it was a terrible experience. I was confused why her place was rated so high, and now I get why: they are removing negative reviews so they donâ€™t lose business. I will never book with them again because now I canâ€™t even trust the ratings, since they are being tampered with.

title: Airbnb Supports Genocide
text: Deleting the app and my account since airbnb supports genocide. Do better.

title: Terrible customer service
text: Donâ€™t expect too much from their customer service either youâ€™re a guest or a host. Just look at many complaints from many users and on the news throughout the world and youâ€™ll know their standards are extremely poor.

title: Worst Customer Service
text: Iâ€™ve been using airbnb for years and normally I donâ€™t run into many issues but the last trip we booked through airbnb truly showed how little they care about helping guests.  When we showed up to our airbnb it felt like a scam (dirty house, personal belongings everywhere, valuables left out) and we left immediately.  After reporting this to airbnb we were left on read for weeks and never received a full refund.  Even after we were able to get the host to refund us a little more money airbnb refused to release it to us.  Airbnb does not care about your experience after youâ€™ve booked with them and trying to get a refund for any reason is a nightmare.  I recommend staying at a hotel.

title: App only works with WiFi
text: Have tried with several different devices. App only works with WiFi for some reason. Regardless of what country, carrier, connection you have. Please work on this as sometimes when traveling you donâ€™t have access to WiFi and need to message host etc.

title: APP REVIEW ONLY
text:
Whatâ€™s happened to this app? These filters
(houseboats, play, castles) are ridiculous. Itâ€™s impossible to get back to home, my account & saved places. It worked fine before, please make it less of a PITA.

title: Horror Show
text:
Is this a joke? Try to find the square feet/meter? NO!
Try to find proximity to an important site on the map?
NO!
Every time I try to use this App and get a headache and turn (over & over) to their main competitor who started much later with this concept and has gone zooming right past AirBnb in "ease of use" and "common sense."
